channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Running .NET in the browser without Blazor
item.description: In this post I show how to run .NET in your browser without using Blazor, and instead rely on lower-level abstractions provided by [JSImport] and [JSExport] Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/running-dotnet-in-the-browser-without-blazor/

item.title: Passkey support for ASP.NET Core identity: Exploring the .NET 10 preview - Part 6
item.description: In this post I look at the passkey support added to ASP.NET Core Identity and the Blazor Web App template, explore how it works, and look at the implementation Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/exploring-dotnet-10-preview-features-6-passkey-support-for-aspnetcore-identity/
